text: @tedcruz Blame China dosn't excuse US lack of response.😈 your "look here, not there" strategy doesn't work. @realDonaldTrump did nothing but downplay #coronavirus . #TrumpIsALaughingStock for his response to the pandemic. 😈 #TrumpLiesAmericansDie #NovemberIsComing
